pages.name: A Crawler
pages.text: A floor-bound clod variant that pulls itself across the ground to players and gems so they can attack them.

pages.name: A Shambler
pages.text: A bipedal clod variant that rushes to players and gems so they can attack them.

pages.name: An Abomination
pages.text: A much larger bipedal clod variant that rushes to players and gems so they can attack them.

Clods are the result of poor kindergarten management, whether it's purposeful or otherwise. They emerge when a gem fails to form correctly, due to a myriad of reasons including poor soil quality or an unbalanced injection site.$(br2)Clods are also a source of Chroma, the gooey chunks they drop can be brought to a Peridot for refining.

They are extremely hostile entities that seek out both players and gems so they can attack and try to devour them for sustenance.$(br2)They desperately crave to become whole instead of living in anguish due to their unfinished state.
Clods can infect gems with sludge upon attacking, brainwashing them and turning them hostile to their owner.
